website_summaries.verdict: A well-rounded model that offers nearly everything consumers look for in a ceiling fan. Impressive air movement, versatile features, quiet motor, and attractive styling.
pros: Great for outdoor living spaces such as sun porches, patios
Beautiful light, solid build, and quiet operation
cons: Fan is confusing to put together and install, even for pros
Doesn't come with a remote, but can be wired for a compatible unit

customer_reviews.title: Great fan, tips on how to attach blades....
customer_reviews.text: Great Fan! Very quiet, moves air well. Like other reviewers have said, you do have to take the shade off in order to change the flow/direction but I've never used this feature with any other fan, so I doubt I will care too much about that. The lighting is extremely dim, more like mood lighting. Would definitely not be enough lighting for my living room if I didn't already have can lights. I typically put the fans together by myself, total time from start to finish is typically about 2 hours. I included some pictures to show how to properly attach the blades as it seems from other reviewers that this was a difficult thing for some.
customer_reviews.author: Marie S

customer_reviews.title: Love the Look, but that is about it.
customer_reviews.text: Looks like we got one out of a bad batch! Install had a lot of unnecessary steps, it wasn't difficult to install aside from the modifications we had to make to it. Once installed it made a horrid rubbing noise. We were able to lower the shroud using washers to eliminate the the rubbing. The speeds are not typical for ceiling fan speeds. The slow and medium speeds are pretty much pointless to use. The high speed is high. The only reason we didn't return it was because we really liked the looks of this one for our porch and the fact that my husband is super handy and was able to work through the flaws.
customer_reviews.author: J. Weinzierl

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: The Hunter 59135 Key Biscayne 54" indoor/outdoor ceiling fan is quiet and easy to install. The air out put is better than I expected, can feel the air completely across my screen in back patio. Took me about 1.5 hours to put it up from start to finish and that doing it alone with 8' step ladder. All in all its a good buy, now don't have to plug up several floor fans to move the air around.
customer_reviews.author: G-Force

customer_reviews.title: Great look.  Performs as expected.  Set up is pretty mich a breeze.
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this outdoor fan. I have it installed underneath my carport. It is about 10 feet off the ground, so you have to have it on high abd be right underneath it to really the feel the effects of the breeze. It seems to help keep bugs away somewhat during the hot summer H-town nights. And, it is a Hurricane Harvey survivor. Installation took about two hours or so from unboxing to installing.
customer_reviews.author: Texas KnowHow

customer_reviews.title: Check to make sure the "blade irons" are installed the right way!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful, sturdy fan which looks great on our patio. Be aware though, that if you install the "blade irons" upside down on the blades - which is easy to do, the fan will rub and probably not function. The flatter side should be facing the blade. Took us a while to figure out this error because the instructions are a bit unclear as to which way they go. After we solved that problem, it was a "breeze". ; )
customer_reviews.author: Jill Besterfield

customer_reviews.title: Hunter fan installation
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Only thing is if you want to reverse direction, need to get on a ladder,remove light cover, switch toggle switch and reinstall light cover.
customer_reviews.author: Hip Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Where's the air flow?
customer_reviews.text: Installation is pretty much a breeze. Very quiet and study. But it doesn't seem to have much air flow in either direction on the highest speed. Sure we can feel a little air but it feels like someone is blowing on you rather than a high velocity fan. Something wrong?
customer_reviews.author: North Carolina Consumers Council

customer_reviews.title: Hard to install , not up to Hunters standards
customer_reviews.text: I am a retired remodeler , I have installed many ceiling fans over the years. If you are a fan of puzzles you will love this fan. I have never seen more parts in a kit. As for it being a deluxe fan, the blades have no rubber grommets and the glass fits so loosely it surely won't take long to be filled with bugs. Up to this point in time I have always recommended Hunter.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Design Flaw/ Fixed
customer_reviews.text: Blade hardware hits light kit beneath. Embarrassing design Hunter. Why make the distance between blade hardware and light kit the thickness of tissue paper?! Dumbfounded here. To fix this problem you need to add spacers between the motor housing and light kit. I used the weighted strips that come with the fandoms are supposed to be used for balancing the blades. Cut them into pieces and stick them, 4 layer thickness, on the disk below the motor housing as you see in the photo. You also want to make sure to get good balanced coverage over this disk as the light kit will be pressed up against the spacers. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: D. Weaver

customer_reviews.title: The fan is nice and quiet however
customer_reviews.text: The fan is nice and quiet however, the light is very dim. The glass light diffuser is nice but too thick and restricts light output. Even with brighter bulbs there wasn’t much improvement. I ended up replacing the diffuser.
customer_reviews.author: Allan M

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty in the patio
customer_reviews.text: The ones I bought did not come w remotes so I can't comment on that but I'm also disappointed that they don't come with remotes. Other then that, they look really great outside on my patio. They work really nice and light up good. Not super bright but still happy with it. You can choose between 2 colors for the blades. I liked the more brown color. They don't make any noise. The balance is good so they don't shake. I'm in love with these. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Virgie

customer_reviews.title: Bearings worn out
customer_reviews.text: Bearings wore out in less than 2 years. Hunter used to be better than this...they still charge enough to be better? Edited to add: I contacted Hunter about the bearings wearing out, and they sent a complete new fan and return label for the damaged fan. It’s a pain to change out the fan, but at least the lifetime warranty covered this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Peaches

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but not much light and a bit of work to install.
customer_reviews.text: A bit more complicated to assemble and install than most fans I've installed over the years. It looks great tho. Downsides: to change burned out builds you have to unscrew the light fixture to get to the bulbs. It also doesn't throw much light with the accompanying bulbs so you'll need additional light to, say, read a book. And after only 4 pulls on the light chain, the grab part you grasp came right off.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley S.

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and Powerful
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the reviewers that said this fan is difficult to install have never installed a ceiling fan before. I've probably put up close to 30 fans in my life and this fan was on the easy side of a normal install. Not the simplest only because of having to assemble the blades. Otherwise, smooth as silk. I didn't even cuss once. It took a little over an hour and each step was well documented in the install instructions. Once up, it powered right on. Ran extremely quietly and moved plenty of air. Great purchase. Time will tell if the blades hold up in an outdoor environment like they are supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cryer

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Product was not as described - description showed cfm 6239 and the box shows cfm 4170. The cfm was the main reason that I made this purchase. It is damp rated however, there was a sheet of paper on the fan blades that indicated the blades would droop due to moisture. The instructions are not easy to follow. Another issue with this fan - came with compact florescent bulbs and I wanted LED - I am having trouble finding a comparable LED due to compact size. Hunter website only states to buy a 14 watt bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Motor is shot
customer_reviews.text: Bought this fan in 2016 and the motor burnt up yesterday. I tried turning it on by the pull chain and it wouldn’t turn on. I smelled something burning while trying to turn it on. My fiancé looked at it and confirmed the motor is burnt up. It’s only 3 1/2 years old. It shouldn’t have burnt up this quick. Most ceiling fans last for many years.
customer_reviews.author: GrgShutt

customer_reviews.title: Dead in under two years!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fan in April of 2016. It looked nice and I liked it. However, less than two years later it started making noise like a bearing was grinding and the motor died a day later. Very shoddy product for the price.... Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stix

customer_reviews.title: Great fan.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and working fan. It had a lot of small screws that were aggravating to install and not clearly labelled for location. I have installed fans for 30 plus years. This was not a smooth fan to install. Plus I have never seen the reverse switch under the glass light globe. I would rather it be enclosed in a waterproof button on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: J R

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and helps move the hot air on the porch so it is more enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: Added a fan to our porch to it isn't so stagnate. This did the trick and looks pretty good. The install wasn't hard, but it does take a while to put together so I'm knocking off a star. I've had other fans where the blades just clip in without having to screw in the brackets for all the blades and mountings. It is quiet and moves air well. I added a remote control module which makes it easy to turn the light and fan off from inside the house before going out there in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M

customer_reviews.title: I love the style but there is a design flaw
customer_reviews.text: I love the style but there is a design flaw. My husband and I installed the fan. I noticed the fan was noisy and the fan blades didn't move freely. The solution I did was 1/4 in spacer between the light housing and the motor. I also bought new screws 8-32 3/4in to account for spacer. Now the fan works perfectly and I love it on my porch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Outdoor Fan
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this after being unable to find a non-remote controlled fan at Lowe's and I am obsessed with this fan. It was a little difficult for my husband to install and assemble but no more or no less than any other fan would have been (he also did not have any assistance so that could have contributed to the lack of ease). It puts out much more light than our previous fan and you can actually feel the breeze from the fan when it is turned on. It was packaged very well and I love the overall aesthetic of the fan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great light and fan
customer_reviews.text: looks great, works perfectly nice and quiet. I switched to LED light bulbs for a brighter look
customer_reviews.author: RHB

customer_reviews.title: Yes, there is a design flaw, but there is also an easy fix.
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this fan! But READ THE OTHER REVIEWS and follow their direction to ensure the flaw is fixed and the blades don't rub. Look at the pictures in the instructions rather than using intuition. The part that you have to install upside down can't be seen, so it doesn't affect anything negatively, only fixes a design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Reviews By Beth

customer_reviews.title: Beware.... Product does not have a REMOTE.  False description.
customer_reviews.text: Buyer Beware... Product description is false. I bought this fan due to the style, reviews, and because the description says it comes with a REMOTE. Opened the box... Installed the fan... Guess what... NO REMOTE. I have high ceilings and it will be a pain to control the fan speed. I would have been a happy camper if everything mentioned on the title was included.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Narvasa

customer_reviews.title: Installation tricky but very nice looking when installed.
customer_reviews.text: Just got it working. Installer initially put fan blades on upside down as happened to several others on here. Reviews were very helpful to get him to try reversing them, which fixed the issue. So if you install and the blades rub or don't turn, you need to reattach the fan blades after reversing the metal part that connects fan blades to fan. You want the bracket on top of the fan and curving to the left of the fan blade as you look from below. Good luck! Installer said this fan was a pain to install fyi. Bracket really should be labelled to prevent this as it is such an easy mistake to make.
customer_reviews.author: J.E. Mullany

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is just what my wife wanted and it was easy to install the one is it pretty heavy but once you have it on the hanger things get better the small screws they use for putting the shroud and light globe on could be a little longer then maybe I wouldn’t have dropped them several times. But overall it’s a great fan and I got it for $15 less on Amazon than they had it for at Lowes
customer_reviews.author: chevy guy

customer_reviews.title: Good Patio Fan
customer_reviews.text: Installation was fairly straight forward. Instructions had a contradictory statements about direction of fan rotation for downward air. Once inspecting blades, clockwise is correct. Air flow is good, runs almost silent, light is good and fashionable and remote works well.
customer_reviews.author: William Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: Great Coastal looking outdoor fan.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install if you can follow instructions. High quality parts that fit together perfectly. Great price. I'm buying two more. Separate pull chains for light and 3 speed fan. At high speed, very quiet and stable. Air flow is excellent at high speed. Two (2" and 3") different size down rods. Hunter is a very high quality product. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Keith S Brickell

customer_reviews.title: Great fan, weird smell
customer_reviews.text: This fan was pretty easy to install and I'm not sure why other reviewers had issues. It runs quietly, puts off a lot of light, and looks good. The only bad part is it has a weird oily, plasticky smell while it's running and it's pretty strong (enough to still smell in the room for hours after it's turned off). I've only had it for a few days and I'm hoping it'll stop smelling over time.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Reviews were very helpful about fan blade brackets seem like they should go one way but really go the ...
customer_reviews.text: Reviews were very helpful about fan blade brackets seem like they should go one way but really go the other way. Forgot to mention to guys when they installed and they said it was rubbing, couldn't figure out why, read them the reviews and they switched them around, works perfectly. Thank you to those who wrote about the issue and explained it better than I. Put led bulb in instead of bulb that was included. Helped with low lighting issue
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Dralle

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, moves a lot of air, really attractive design!
customer_reviews.text: Quiet, moves a lot of air, really attractive design. We hired someone to install it, took him about an hour. Note, the blades can be flipped over (before installing) for the solid or graduated color, that wasn't clear when I ordered it, but we were very please to have that choice!
customer_reviews.author: dogLover

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fan but assembly is really tricky
customer_reviews.text: I thought this product came with a remote control but there was none with it. Once installed the fan is beautiful and quiet. Like other reviews said it was pretty difficult to assemble we had to assemble the fan blades twice because we got the wrong the first time. Just like all the other reviews said.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Gerber

customer_reviews.title: We could not find anything else that worked with our sun room decor and love the finished product.
customer_reviews.text: Great style, bad engineering! As others have noted the light kit interferes with the fan blades. Four #10 flat washers on each attaching screw will provide the needed clearance, < $2.00 at Ace or your local hardware store. Take one of the light kit screws with you and get several that are slightly longer to make the installation easier, they are metric threads. Additionally the cfl bulb provided is not dimmable. Buy a dimmable LED if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Blanchette

customer_reviews.title: Nice fan, Light way to dim.
customer_reviews.text: Fan looks great but the light is very dim. We have it in a sun room and will need a lamp or two so we can play cards at night. It literally is no more than a large night light.
customer_reviews.author: S. Tefft

customer_reviews.title: Silent. Wife and Mother-in-Law approved. Does anything else ...
customer_reviews.text: Silent. Wife and Mother-in-Law approved. Does anything else need to be said? The fan does not come with a remote, which changes the price/installation. The installation took a few minutes longer than I expected because of so many individual pieces/screws etc. However, if you can follow directions, you can install this fan. I didn't even need to balance the blades, there was zero wobble from the start.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Great ceiling fan
customer_reviews.text: We bought 4 of these fans for our new home. One was missing the glass globe and had to be returned. New one arrived in a few days. These fans look great and are very quiet. The only problem I see is that the light is very dim. I'm guessing we'll have to replace the light bulbs with brighter ones soon.
customer_reviews.author: djp332

customer_reviews.title: This was not up to code.
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty fan but the electron said he could not install it because it was not up to code. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE our fan. We’ve recently moved to an older home. I wanted do have lighting that goes w/the character of the house. We are so happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking fan for the price
customer_reviews.text: Installed in the living room to replace a generic looking fan. Installation was very easy and the Hunter quality is well known. It looks awesome in the space and is very quiet and doesn't wobble like some fans do.
customer_reviews.author: garyneth

customer_reviews.title: Difficult assembly
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice fan. However. I’ve installed my fair share of fans in my life. This one was a puzzle that seemed to go on forever. It took me about 2 hrs to assemble and install. . I’m a HVAC tech and a Sr Maintnace technician for a living , and this thing had me ready to throw it across the yard .
customer_reviews.author: Joshua  Scribner

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the look of this fan
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was very fast. Assembly was relatively simple, my husband was able to put it together in about 2 hours without any problems (he's never installed a ceiling fan before). LOVE the look of this fan! Lighting is great (we used two daylight LED bulbs) and air circulation is great. I wish they made this model is a smaller size as well as I would love one for our mud room!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Weathered Gray is darker in reality
customer_reviews.text: Really nice. Like it a lot. The weathered gray is darker in person and looks dark spinning fast.
customer_reviews.author: osborntownroad

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this Hunter fan.
customer_reviews.text: Noises and wobbles. Disappointed with this Hunter fan. Directions poorly written. I’ve installed several ceiling fans and I worked on this one for over six hours. Finally shimmed motor cover with rubber faucet washers.
customer_reviews.author: gsprink

customer_reviews.title: All in All a Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: We are not electricians, so the first time we put this fan up, it took a little while. I say "the first time" because we had to send our first ceiling fan back. The fan did not work but the light did. The company quickly sent us a new one. It is beautiful, not cheaply made or flimsy, and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja

customer_reviews.title: A contest in incompetence.
customer_reviews.text: Fan was sold with missing parts. amazon’s support people were slightly more help than Hunter fans’. But only because hunter took over a week to get back to me. Turns out it was easier to buy the replacement parts that were never shipped that it was to get either company to fix a mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and efficient
customer_reviews.text: Very good looking. You’ll get a nice breeze from it. I got three of them. Had a bit of a hard time with the first because on unclear instructions. You have to figure which screw to use at each step if the way. Not rocket science but should be a simple fix to have the screws identified in the manual. Also, make sure to look at the illustrations to get the blades right. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Cayoverde

customer_reviews.title: Superb quiet fan, but low intensity lighting
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the style and how quiet it is. It was easy to install. The only issue I have is that the provided LED unit gives off low intensity lighting, so I need extra light in the room to be able to read, sort clothes, ... Too bad and hope this could be changed!
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to install and rattles
customer_reviews.text: We waited until we had a professional come in to install it and after 3 hours he gave up. We bought the remote and couldn't get it to work and the fan rattles. We can't return it because outside of the window - so going to find something else tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Darren L Cross

customer_reviews.title: fan not working
customer_reviews.text: Came as described , as new. initially bought to replace parts on 2 hunter fans. Took half a year to get hurricane damaged doors and windows repaired before I could replace the old hunter fan which still turned without blades ;). This one only got light working. Spend lot of time to exclude all possible powerfail issues. At the end of the day power in connector confirmed but not going back to fan. Since old one still turns I can try to replace the switch as well. I guess better by new next time
customer_reviews.author: Dirk L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for outdoor patio
customer_reviews.text: My son installed this fan on my screened in patio and I love it! It's very nice looking and works great! The light is beautiful and the fan moves air really well. I ordered the remote control and it's works perfectly with the fan/light
customer_reviews.author: Gail Boylan

customer_reviews.title: Like many of the other reviews the light is low ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this light for my family room. Like many of the other reviews the light is low even with LED bulbs in it. The glass bowl is very thick and impedes the amount of light going through. But the apparence is great with the industrial look. I will just add a lamp or two in the room. The Fan is very quite.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Fanshier

customer_reviews.title: Prompt service from company
customer_reviews.text: We love our fans. We bought two for our covered porch. They work well and were easy to put up. The only thing was one of our fans was missing a part. I called the company and they shipped the part withina week with no questions asked and were very friendly.
customer_reviews.author: S Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking fan
customer_reviews.text: Very good looking fan and very fast as well. Highly recommend it. Installation difficulty level is intermediate.
customer_reviews.author: LTC2015

customer_reviews.title: I bought two to install under a patio cover and I expect to get good service from them
customer_reviews.text: This fan is very different from a typical indoor ceiling fan. All of the metal pieces are coated and the motor is sealed. My electrician was also very impressed. I bought two to install under a patio cover and I expect to get good service from them. I do wish there was a color closer to cedar but I would buy these again over any other outdoor fan I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Perry

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and powerful
customer_reviews.text: Super quiet fan, very powerful, keeps the living room cooled off while it's 115 outside. Ordering more for bedrooms
customer_reviews.author: B. A. D.

customer_reviews.title: Beware of blade bracket mounting!!
customer_reviews.text: If you mount the blade brackets to the blades the way that looks correct, the blades will rub against the light housing. Mount them with the unfinished metal side up. Judging by the other recent reviews I was not first one to make this mistake. If you look closely at the directions it shows it correctly, but who looks at those?
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Love this fan.
customer_reviews.text: The instructions suck but once I saw the other reviews showing how to properly install the fan blades, I was good to go. The instructions do actually show how the blades are supposed to go but it isn't very clear. It would help if the manufacturer made it more obvious. Very quiet fan. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: lucille brooks

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2. 1 I've used for over a year. My 14 year old daughter and I installed it. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: LISA

customer_reviews.title: Great look and easy assembly if you have done fans ...
customer_reviews.text: Great look and easy assembly if you have done fans before. The gapping between the motor and blades needs to be looked into. I tightened it too tight which kept the motor from turning. I had to add washers so it would leave enough space.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Stamaris

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fan
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous rustic looking fan. We don't use the remote control, have it hooked to light switch instead. It is so quiet and was not too difficult to install.
customer_reviews.author: sbander1

customer_reviews.title: Poor design - you’ll need some ingenuity to install
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these fans and both of them had the same design fault which caused the fan blade housing to bind against the housing for the light. The result was the blades would not turn once the fan and light were assembled. Our installer figured out a work-around but why should this be necessary? Also, one of the boxes was missing a part. Again, our installer figured out a substitute. We've owned Hunter fans for years so it was disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Dave N

customer_reviews.title: We got two of these fans and we absolutely love them! They look great
customer_reviews.text: We got two of these fans and we absolutely love them! They look great, installation wasn't bad, and the light produced is plenty. I was concerned about the light output, but it's fine. I have read others that say to get an LCD light if it's not enough. The best part is that it really pushes the air and with these installed on our patio in Phoenix... well, air movement is very important. Very happy with these fans!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi McBreen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, no noise, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 and I’m in love with them! The first fan took a little bit to install, but I was a pro when I got to the second one. You can’t hear any type of noise even when the fan is on full speed. They’re beautifully made and such a gorgeous addition to my back porch!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fan for outdoor room
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our outdoor room to replace a different brand rusty fan that came with the house we purchased. This fan looks great (visitors comment on it!), moves air very well, and seems to be of high quality meant for outdoors. I like the stainless steel construction; hopefully it won't rust easily in the humid Florida air.
customer_reviews.author: Kari M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit and finish
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan. Was disappointed no remote control, I assumed it came with one. Have yo buy one?
customer_reviews.author: Blank

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan
customer_reviews.text: We have this on our screened porch. I love the look of the distressed wood blades. Remote works well, it’s quiet and gives off good light.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Harman

customer_reviews.title: Great fan for the outdoor areas
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent fan for outdoor porches and it does look smart as well. I had a professional install it and it does the job quite well. And it is a Hunter fan, and Hunter fans are top quality in both my opinion and more importantly my electricians opinion. That is why we purchased it over any other fan out there.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in farm house style house. Used in bedroom. Good quality. Not enough light if used as only source.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L.

customer_reviews.title: Looks lovely
customer_reviews.text: Wanted an updated look and this was it. Looks great and elegant, works quietly. Don’t know about a remote as we never received one with this fan
customer_reviews.author: Krysia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to Porch
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful addition to my porch. It helps move the air around great and is so pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Nee

customer_reviews.title: Great fan, dim light
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful fan we just installed on our screened in porch for the summer. It has three speeds, and has garnered a lot of positive feedback from guests! The one drawback (taking it down one star to four) is the low level of light from the included CFLs. If they would include LEDs or rate it for a higher wattage of CFLs, it would be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: scott K

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated with product.
customer_reviews.text: We spent a lot of time looking for the right fan. It seemed like this was a good product. As we are installing the cover of the fan has styrofoam stuck to it as it looks like it was packed before the paint dried. Then we went to put it up and you have given us all different screws. I just hope once it is installed it will work right. We have just built a gazebo and we are paying someone to help install the fan so this is not a costly fan. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Farmer girl

customer_reviews.title: Very Striking
customer_reviews.text: This fan looks very nice on our porch. We installed it with no problem and it gives us a nice breeze in the hot afternoons when we are outside. I love the look of this fan, so sophisticated and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: V. Canfield

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to patio
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our covered patio that was being put in. Looks great and light is bright.
customer_reviews.author: momin08

customer_reviews.title: This fan is PERFECT. Easy to install and the colors are amazing ...
customer_reviews.text: This fan is PERFECT. Easy to install and the colors are amazing for a rustic but classy feel. We currently have it on the grey side but love the option to flip the blades for a different look. We are talking about buying more for another room.
customer_reviews.author: V.U. Crew

customer_reviews.title: Too weighty for my porch ceiling
customer_reviews.text: Great fan. Unfortunately, I returned due to the fact that my screened porch ceiling could not handle the weight of the fan. Make sure your ceiling can handle the weight of this wonderfully constructed ceiling light fan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but don't lose remote!
customer_reviews.text: This is great. I just purchased another one for main room. It is a bit too big for my son's bedroom so take note of overall size. And we lost remote and not sure how to deal with that, but that's on us! It looks great and works well!
customer_reviews.author: Mptopf

customer_reviews.title: A nice outdoor fan
customer_reviews.text: A nice unit. Easy to install and looks great on our patio.
customer_reviews.author: William A. Mays

customer_reviews.title: Took some fiddling to get to spin without scraping
customer_reviews.text: I just installed this fan, and it looks very nice and runs quietly. However, when I first mounted it, there was not enough clearance between the fan and the light fixture below. It would scrape as it spun. I had to add washers to the screws holding the two sections together to create the space needed. This took several tries to get it sufficiently separated so it was able to spin without scraping.
customer_reviews.author: AnthonyCody

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love my new ceiling fan! It was easy for my husband to install, and balance. I would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Wife&MomOf4

customer_reviews.title: Complicated install
customer_reviews.text: It took 2 handymen over 2 hours to install due to horrible instructions. The glass bulb was badly cracked upon opening. I do like the look and it keeps my deck breezy, but I'd recommend better instructions and packing by Hunter.
customer_reviews.author: moberkc

customer_reviews.title: Attractive
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for our screened porch and have only had for a couple of months, but we love the look. Hoping they function and hold up. Some have mentioned it doesn't illuminate enough for them, but they do for us. Our porch is 12 x 19' and with 2 fans, there is plenty of light, esp. with our lamps.
customer_reviews.author: Kswilli

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fan
customer_reviews.text: Really nice fan. We installed it on our dock and it looks great, is quiet and the light s perfect for the table that is below it. Read the instructions carefully, especially when attaching the blades to the metal brackets. I did it upside down the first time and the brackets rub on the housing. Reversed them and it is fine.
customer_reviews.author: BigAndyA

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and attractive fan
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful fan and is very quiet. I’ve always been pleased with Hunter fans. This one was a little more challenging to install. Pay close attention to the brackets for the fan blades. I put the top piece on backwards and ended up having to take the light fixture and blades off the fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Grasso

customer_reviews.title: Ceiling fan
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for daughter's room. She loves the design, works fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this fan. We bought two of them for our screened in back porch. They really make the porch look and feel like part of a vacation retreat.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hyde

customer_reviews.title: Great fan if .........
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying, it looks better in person, than in the picture. It's Hunters, prestige line. The light is a little weird looking. It's a pain to put together. If you put the blades on wrong, it rubs and you need to add some weights to a few of the fan blades to eliminate the wobble.
customer_reviews.author: Chad D. Mcdaniel

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: This is one beautiful heavy-duty outdoor fan! The light kit has two bulbs and they are bright! Really makes our porch look nice.
customer_reviews.author: maggie may

customer_reviews.title: Hunter Ceiling Fan
customer_reviews.text: Installed in my living room. I really like the looks of the fan but I would prefer that you didn't have to take the light globe off to switch the fan direction.
customer_reviews.author: Haas

customer_reviews.title: Love these fans
customer_reviews.text: Love these fans. Ordered 4 but one had to be returned and reordered because there were many issues with it - broken parts, damaged blades, damaged glass, missing screws. But great looking fan!
customer_reviews.author: Justine B.

customer_reviews.title: Indoor OR Outdoor  Looks Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace a fan above my hot tub. It was easy to install and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: C Gard

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Ceiling Fan
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful ceiling fan, this is undeniable! Four stars because of the many different bags of screws in the installation directions are not marked adequately.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Hard installation, but looks good
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, just like the photo. Paid professionals to instal, they said it was the hardest fan they have ever installed. Ha! Bulb too dim, had to buy brighter wattage bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica E.

customer_reviews.title: Love these for outdoor patio!
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect. Bought 2 for our real tall outdoor patio ceilings. Extra length rods got at Home Depot
customer_reviews.author: Tina Roth

customer_reviews.title: Good looking fan
customer_reviews.text: We put this fan in our living room and it looks great. I like the design and it has functioned perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: bmann

customer_reviews.title: very bad directions and very pretty but not easy to install ...
customer_reviews.text: very bad directions and very pretty but not easy to install and the arms rub also when I called hunter they were not helpful
customer_reviews.author: K .R.

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 2 years, maybe I’m unreasonable in my expectations but I’m disappointed in Hunter.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Sturman

customer_reviews.title: Very Nautical. Ive gotten lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.text: Love this fan. Very Nautical looking which is what I was looking for. We built a house and my husband bought all the fans from a big box store. But I told him I wanted this one for our living room. Love it! Puts out plenty of air.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but
customer_reviews.text: The ceiling fan looks good. We installed the fan in our gazebo. Was easy to install. The only bad thing is that it is rubbing on the light fixture, and will only run on high because of the friction caused by the rubbing will not allow it to run on a slower speed.
customer_reviews.author: tommyg

customer_reviews.title: The blades might not look like a million bucks
customer_reviews.text: The blades might not look like a million bucks, but there's not a human around that hasn't "LOVED" our fan. It has a great "Japanese" garden look to it.
customer_reviews.author: Alain

product_meta.title: Hunter Fan Company Hunter 59135 Nautical 54``Ceiling Fan from Key Biscayne collection in Bronze/Dark finish, Weathered Zinc
product_meta.description: Size:54"| Color:Weathered ZincNautical 54``Ceiling Fan from Key Biscayne collection in Weathered Zinc finish
feature_bullets: WhisperWind motor delivers ultra-powerful air movement with whisper-quiet performance so you get the cooling power you want without the noise you don’t
Reversible motor allows you to change the direction of your fan from downdraft mode during the summer to updraft mode during the winter
ETL Damp-rated for use in covered porches, patios and sunrooms, Installer's Choice three position mounting system allows for standard, low or angled mounting
Included pull chain allows for quick and easy on/off and speed adjustments. 13 blade pitch
Limited Lifetime Motor Warranty is backed by the only company with over 126 years in the fan business.Recommended Light Bulb Shape Code:A19
Includes integrated light kit with Cased White glass, Two 14W Standard Medium Base CFL bulbs included

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars550 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
